job_description:
• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
• For more information about GDIT's Privacy Policy, click here: https://www.
• Com/privacy-policy/notices/.

• Experience in BI development, data analytics, or a related technical role.
• Hands-on experience with Power BI, including DAX and Power Query.
• Practical experience with SharePoint Online lists, including list creation and calculated columns.
• Basic-to-intermediate Python scripting skills.
• Strong communication skills and willingness to collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
• Write and maintain SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to support reporting needs.
• Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand reporting requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
• Understanding of data modeling concepts (star schema, relationships, measures).

• You will use your experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• Your skills will drive project success and business growth.
